tweet: The origins of the word Litecoin were derived not just from it being a "lite" version of Bitcoin.  I was looking at "Lime Tea Company Incorporated" and the light-bulb moment came where the letters were calling me to pick the name.  The letters were:  LIme TEa COmpany INcorporated

Litecoin wasn't an ICO. And there were no marching orders about attacking Litecoin and other coins.  The idea of maximalism only started after Ethereum came on the scene. It was a defensive reaction triggered by the Ethereum flippening Bitcoin talks.
